name: Tapenade
keywords: anchovy fillets, capers, greek olives, lemon, tuna, appetizer
recipeIngredient: 2 cups Greek or Moroccan dry-cured olives, pitted
6 ounces anchovy filets, drained and patted dry
16-ounce can good-quality canned tuna in oil, drained
1 tablespoon green peppercorns in brine, drained and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Pulse all ingredients except oil and shells in a food processor until just combined. With motor running, slowly pour in oil. Do not overprocess: the tapenade should have some chunkiness. Refrigerate for later use or spoon into lemon shells.
